title: Link a video to a TTO Creator Marketplace campaign as a creator

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators. Use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ or /tt_user/oauth2/refresh_token/ endpoint to get or renew an access token.

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: creator_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique ID of the TikTok account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ or /tt_user/oauth2/refresh_token/ to this field.

parameters.name: tto_invite_link
parameters.description: An invite link that is associated with a TTO Creator Marketplace campaign. To create a TTO Creator Marketplace campaign and obtain the associated invite link, use /tto/tcm/campaign/create/ . Note : If the invite link is a campaign level invite link (the campaign_type of the associated campaign is CAMPAIGN ), the creator should be one of the creators invited to the campaign. To confirm this, use /tto/tcm/campaign/ and check whether the returned handle_names includes the handle name of the creator ( creator_id ). If the invite link is a brand level invite link (the campaign_type of the associated campaign is BRAND ), the creator can be any TTO creator.

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: The ID of a video posted by the TTO creator. To obtain a list of videos posted by a TTO creator, use /tto/creator/authorized/video/list/ . To publish a video post from the TikTok account of a TTO creator, use /business/video/publish/ . Note : The ID cannot be of a video that has been linked to an existing TTO Creator Marketplace campaign.
